question: The Constitution of India was adopted on:
explanation: The Constitution of India was adopted by the Constituent Assembly on 26th November 1949, but it came into effect on 26th January 1950. This date was chosen to honor the Purna Swaraj declaration of 1930.
source: NCERT Class 11 - Constitution: Why and How?
notes: Adopted: 26 Nov 1949, Came into force: 26 Jan 1950

question: Who is known as the 'Father of the Indian Constitution'?
explanation: Dr. B.R. Ambedkar, as the Chairman of the Drafting Committee, played a pivotal role in drafting the Constitution of India. His expertise in law and his vision for social justice earned him the title 'Father of the Indian Constitution'.
source: NCERT Class 11 - Constitution: Why and How?
notes: Ambedkar was Chairman of Drafting Committee, not President of Constituent Assembly (that was Dr. Rajendra Prasad)
